title: Berry salad with passion fruit
ingredients: ['450 g (1 lb) strawberries, cut in half', '150 g (5½ oz) raspberries', '100 g (3½ oz) blackberries', '100 g (3½ oz) blueberries', '100 g (3½ oz) mixed redcurrants and blackcurrants, removed from their stalks', '2 passion fruit', '1 tbsp caster sugar', 'juice of ½ lemon or lime']
